featured.text: Waimea Canyon, called the "Grand Canyon of the Pacific" by Mark Twain, cuts a deep gash through the rugged central mountains.

definition.zh_def: 峽谷：由河流侵蝕而形成的深而狹的山谷。
definition.en_def: A canyon is a deep, narrow valley with steep sides, often carved by a river.
definition.example: The Grand Canyon is one of the most famous canyons in the world.
